OmniDataTransform.name: VPLCreateServiceAccounts

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:CustomerSelection:NewCustomer 'No' = var:CustomerSelection:NewAccountNeeded 'No' = OR var:SelectPremises:NewAccountPremises 'Yes' = AND | var:ExistingServiceAccountName '/\/\/-/\/\/Service' CONCAT | var:CustomerSelection:BusinessAccountName '/\/\/-/\/\/Service' CONCAT IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: VPL-CreateServiceAccounts
